SELECT i.id_iniciativas, i.descripcion, i.fecha, i.estado,
u.correo as u_correo, u.nombre_usuario as u_nombre_usuario, u.nombre as u_nombre, u.apellido as u_apellido, u.rol as u_rol, u.estado as u_estado, u.area as u_area,
pa.palabra as pa_palabra,
c.id_comentario as c_id_comentario, c.fechare as c_fechare, c.comentario as c_comentario,
us.correo as c_u_correo, us.nombre_usuario as c_u_nombre_usuario, us.nombre as c_u_nombre, us.apellido as c_u_apellido, us.rol as c_u_rol, us.estado as c_u_estado, us.area as c_u_area
FROM iniciativas as i LEFT JOIN palabras_clave as pa on i.id_iniciativas=pa.iniciativas_id_iniciativas LEFT JOIN usuarios as u ON i.proponentes_usuarios_correo=u.correo LEFT JOIN comentarios as c ON c.idf_iniciativa=i.id_iniciativas LEFT JOIN usuarios as us ON c.idf_usuario=us.correo WHERE i.id_iniciativas=#{idin};
